section.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
section.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 13-91 validated a previously made technical amendment.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 18 of the Uniform Statutory Form Power of Attorney Act.
